name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Integration Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in API development and design, utilizing **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **RESTful** architectures to create scalable solutions that enhance communication systems. My proficiency extends to integrating **AI** and **NLP** technologies into platforms, ensuring robust functionality and intelligent data processing. I also bring expertise in CRM systems, facilitating seamless integration for enhanced customer engagement.
My hands-on experience with modern frameworks and libraries, including **Node.js** and machine learning techniques, enables me to build and optimize solutions tailored for diverse environments. I thrive in cloud ecosystems like **Azure** and **AWS**, supporting distributed applications that require video conferencing and VoIP functionalities. With a solid background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, I am adept at delivering secure applications aligned with compliance standards.
